channel.title: GFX related
channel.description: Suppose I cast a spell on someoe and the gfx shows up. How do I make it so that the gfx/animation shows up right on the spot of my character, not the guy that I cast it to?

item.title: GFX related
item.dc:creator: @Joe_w000 Joe w000
item.description:
@Joe_w000 wrote:

Open up the client, Search for the spell, Change the right things, Also, I dun know exactly what to change to, I’m not that good with GFX’s.

Read full topic
